title: Proofread a Blog Post
description: Before publishing, a content manager needs to proofread a blog post for spelling, grammar, and adherence to brand voice.

tasks.description: Read through the draft of the blog post.
Use a grammar and spell-checking tool to identify any errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and corrects all grammatical and spelling mistakes.

tasks.description: Check the post against the brand voice guidelines to ensure the tone is appropriate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the writing style aligns with the brand's persona.
